Package net.sourceforge.seqware.pipeline.modules.alignment

Class Summary
Bfast  
BWA Align reads via BWA.
Flat2TableTranscriptDB Given a set reference transcripts in flat files (fasta sequence file & a mapping/assocation file), create & populate database tables in UCSC format.
MakeBigWig Generate bigWig file from a BAM file.
MapSplice Align reads with via MapSplice This module launches a MapSplice alignment of given reads file(s) against given reference sequences files.
PrepTranscriptDB Given a set of database tables, construct a reference set of transcripts.
TrimAdapter Trim adapter segment (and any following sequence) from reads.
TrimAllReads Trim all reads down to a user-defined length.
TrimCountAdapter Trim adapter segment (and any following sequence) from reads, and get count & % of reads that contain adapter segment.
